channel.title: [Outdated] Reaper Not Reviving Bug
channel.description:
I killed 4 people, 2 were alive and I died to a Knight trying to get another soul, I waited and I was not revived even though I had 2 souls avaliable to me.
I was supposed to be revived with my kept souls.
1. Kill someone 2. Wait 2 nights 3. They die 4. Kill someone (they're a husk) 5. I die 6. Never revived (husk is completely dead)
Pastebin with my Change_log: https://pastebin.com/4TzDmZGr
